### findMatch() {#a3b8cb111a75b0c8fef08ff7ba8285b21}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CopyGeneration::findMatch (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bittracker/registerref">BitTracker::RegisterRef</a> &amp; Inp, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bittracker/registerref">BitTracker::RegisterRef</a> &amp; Out, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonbitsimplify-cpp-/registerset">RegisterSet</a> &amp; AVs)</>}>
Check if there is a register in AVs that is identical to Inp.

If so, set Out to the found register. The output may be a pair Reg:Sub.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbitsimplify-cpp/#l01541">1541</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbitsimplify-cpp">HexagonBitSimplify.cpp</a>.
